Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • conways.game.of.life.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    A cell in the simulation.
    Author:
    ssyl55

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cell(int row, int col, int state)
      Initializes the cell object with position and default off state.

      void evolve(World temporaryWorld, Cell[][] writeToGrid)
      Evolves the cell according to the rules of Conway's Game of Life.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cell

        public Cell(int row,
            int col,
            int state)
        Initializes the cell object with position and default off state.
        Parameters:
        row - the row position of the cell.
        col - the column position of the cell.
        state - the initial state of the cell.

    • Method Detail

      • evolve

        public void evolve(World temporaryWorld,
                   Cell[][] writeToGrid)
        Evolves the cell according to the rules of Conway's Game of Life.
        Parameters:
        writeToGrid - the grid which the cell will write its state to.
        temporaryWorld - the world from which the cell gets its data.

      • getState

        public int getState()
        Returns the state of the cell, either on (1) or off (0).
        Returns:
        the state of the cell.

      • setState

        public void setState(int state)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the state of the cell.
        Parameters:
        state - the new state of the cell.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
